content.text: It's time to take your jerky game to the next level with Sauced-Up Jerky from Scotch Sauce! Sauced-Up Jerky is wet-marinated for at least 24 hours before hitting the dehydrator, ensuring each piece is flavorful and tender while still having the characteristic 'chew' that you expect from quality jerky.

*Classic Beef* is our spin on a traditional beef jerky flavor, done better. Every bite is savory and flavorful with moderate saltiness.
_Savory. Salty. Rich.

*Happy Boy Beef* is marinated for _48 hours_ in our original Happy Boy hot sauce, then tossed in Happy Boy a second time near the end of the drying process for even _more_ flavor. It has a *medium* heat level balanced with sweet and savory notes. One bite and you'll understand what makes this jerky different!
_Spicy. Savory. Zesty. Sweet.

*Garlic Parmesan Happy Boy Beef* is marinated for _48 hours_ in our original Garlic Parmesan Happy Boy hot sauce, then tossed in more sauce a second time near the end of the drying process for even _more_ flavor. It has a *mild* heat level with a flavor that's buttery, cheesy, garlicky, and downright delicious. You've never had craft jerky like this before!
_Mild. Buttery. Garlicky. Savory.

*Extremely Happy Boy Beef* is marinated for _48 hours_ in our Extremely Happy Boy hot sauce, then tossed in more sauce a second time near the end of the drying process for even _more_ flavor. This flavor is as hot as it is flavorful, so if you like spicy snacks, then this one's for you!
_Hot. Savory. Zesty. Sweet.

*Korean Kandy Beef* hits you with sticky sweetness balanced with savory goodness in every bite. We warm it up with a touch of Korean chili flakes to round out the experience. This one will satisfy your salty and sweet cravings!
_Sweet. Warm. Umami.
_Complete allergen and ingredient information available on our website.
